anura.name: AnuraOS
anura.description: A web OS and development environment with v86 linux emulation, features a package manager, code editor, and more!

scramjet.name: Scramjet
scramjet.description: Scramjet is an experimental interception based web proxy that aims to be the successor to Ultraviolet.

ultraviolet.name: Ultraviolet
ultraviolet.description: A highly sophisticated proxy used for evading internet censorship or accessing websites in a controlled sandbox using service-workers.

decomp-me.name: Decomp.me
decomp-me.description: Collaborative decompilation and reverse engineering website, supporting a wide range of platforms and devices!

consumet.name: Consumet
consumet.description: Node.js library that provides high-level APIs for obtaining information on various sources of media.
